frontMatter.title: Vovk.ts 2.0 is here!
frontMatter.description: After testing in multiple large projects, thanks to community feedback, Vovk 2.0 is released with some insignificant breaking changes.

frontMatter.title: Vovk.ts 2.1 - NextResponse.json type inferrence
frontMatter.description: Small but important update for Vovk.ts that gives additional flexibility using NextResponse.
